titleStmt.title: An act for reviving of a former act, entituled, an Act against unlicensed and scandalous books and pamphlets, and for better regulating of printing; with some additions and explanations. Friday the 7th of January, 1652. Ordered by the Parliament, that this Act be forthwith printed and published. Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field, Printer to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: Also issued as part of a through-paged folio set with a table for the entire set added.
On 15B2r: last word of first line of text: "An"; first word of line below initial: "therein"; last word of last line: "their".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
